entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:42 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rosetown Airport 03:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
